 You (and other payees) will endorse all items with your name(s) and “For Deposit Only – Huntington Bank” 

 You are solely responsible for the original check, including storage, retrieval and destruction. Once you deposit the check for processing, you will mark it with the date of deposit and “Huntington Mobile Deposit” and will destroy it within 14 days after the deposit is credited to your account to prevent future deposit;
